thread.title: VIDEO: TGR Financial, CEO & President, Featured in OTCQX Video Series

author: cnbc.com
title: VIDEO: TGR Financial, CEO & President, Featured in OTCQX Video Series
text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 7, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- TGR Financial (OTCQX: TGRF) CEO, Gary L. Tice and President, Garrett S. Richter were interviewed by OTC Markets Group (OTCQX: OTCM) in its prominent OTCQX® Video Series. The series features interviews with senior executives of OTCQX companies as they showcase their businesses and investment profiles.
In the interview, Gary and Garrett discuss:
The mission of TGR Financial and First Florida Integrity Bank – to provide superior service using technology and personal commitment, to its employees, customers, community and shareholders TGR's commitment to the local Southwest Florida community continues to grow, since its inception, their annual fundraising event has allowed TGR to contribute $700,000 to local charities that serve low-income children and their families. Trading on OTCQX for Banks has allowed TGR to meet its two objectives: Creating a market price for its stock and shareholders and liquidity for future investments
To watch the complete interview, visit OTC Markets Group's YouTube page at
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9YKX4mkHmWs
About TGR Financial, Inc.
TGR Financial, Inc. is a Florida corporation organized in November 2011 at the direction of the Board of Directors of First Florida Integrity Bank, formerly known as First National Bank of the Gulf Coast solely for the purpose of becoming a holding company for the Bank. Prior to September 25, 2012, the Company had no operating history and no business purpose other than to become a bank holding company. The Bank provides a full range of banking services to individual and corporate customers from its branch locations in Southwest Florida. All of the Bank's activities relate to community banking and accordingly, the Bank has a single reportable segment.
About OTC Markets Group Inc.
OTC Markets Group Inc. (OTCQX: OTCM) operates the OTCQX® Best Market, the OTCQB® Venture Market, and the Pink® Open Market for 10,000 U.S. and global securities. Through OTC Link® ATS, we connect a diverse network of broker-dealers that provide liquidity and execution services. We enable investors to easily trade through the broker of their choice and empower companies to improve the quality of information available for investors.
To learn more about how we create better informed and more efficient markets, visit www.otcmarkets.com
OTC Link ATS is operated by OTC Link LLC, member FINRA/SIPC and SEC regulated ATS.
